item.title: Glasses Moments 2 - Laura After School
item.description: In my last true story I described how as a 12 year old boy I used to try on and wear for a whole day my father’s spare high astigmatism glasses, and the huge buzz it gave me.

item.title: Glasses Moments 1 - Exploring the Glasses World
item.description: After reading the wonderful glasses stories posted here, I have a few of my own which I am tempted to tell, so here goes.
